New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored a century off 56 balls
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul
Key Match Events: South Africa defeated Bangladesh by 104 runs
Rilee Rossouw scored 109 runs off 56 balls
Quinton de Kock hammered 63 runs off 38 balls
Shakib Al Hasan took two wickets for Bangladesh
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa won the match by 104 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa bowled out Bangladesh for 101 in 16.3 overs
Rossouw's century was packed with seven fours and eight sixes
Others: The match was played at the SCG in Sydney
